level_error:
*usage* 
`/level <number>` to receive hourly alerts when safe low gas price falls below <num>.
 `/level off` stops the alerts until you set a new value.
info_error:
*usage* 
`/info on` to get comprehensive gas price info once an hour.
 `/info off` stops the notifications.
tech_error:
*Sorry* üò¢
We are having a bit of trouble doing that right now.
The incident has been logged.
info_on: You have subscribed to updates on gas level once an hour
info_off: You have cancelled hourly gas level updates
info_parameter_error:
`/info` accepts
`yes` or `on` to start notifications
`no` or `off` to stop them
